extendedInfo.description: "When you can't decide, flip a coin. Not because the coin will choose for you, but because, in that split second, you'll know what side you want it to fall on"Chooser is a tool which helps you to make silly decisions.Are you tired of choosing what to have for lunch or any other repetitive decision?Let to Chooser choose for you!Save your repetitive lists of choices and not write them all again.You can also assign a weight to each option if you like one more than the rest. You can even assign "almost impossible" weight to a choice that you don't want to do but you risk a bit. Also you can use the roulette to choose between people. Tap on the screen in the direction where people are and then slide your finger to start  the decision.Features:Add choices writing the name.Add quick range of number from X to Y.Remove or edit choices by long tapping them.Select how many options will be chosen.Save lists for use later.Add weight (different probability) to each choice.A "fortune wheel" where you tap in the direction where some people are and an arrow will choose between them.Much more customization.Keys: decision, dice, coin, random, luck
